price: ߊ߲ ߓߊ߲߫ ߘߊ߫ ߞߵߊ߬ ( ߓߐ߲ߛߐ߲ ߠߎ߬) ߞߍ߫ ߛߖߌ ߘߌ߫ ߡߊ߬ߞߍ߬ ߦߌߟߊ߫ ߡߝߊߣߍ߲ ߘߐ߫
arabic: ثُمَّ جَعَلۡنَٰهُ نُطۡفَةٗ فِي قَرَارٖ مَّكِينٖ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: thumma jaʿalnāhu nuṭ'fatan fī qarārin makīnin
